required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study of the Immunogenicity and Efficacy of HBsAg Vaccine in Combination With Standard Antiviral Therapy With HB110E
clinical_study.official_title: Study of the Immunogenicity and Efficacy of HBsAg Vaccine in Combination With Standard Antiviral Therapy in Patients Who Have Been Treated With HB110E Hepatitis B DNA Vaccine

oversight_info.authority: South Korea: Korea Food and Drug Administration (KFDA)

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to examine the immunogenicity and efficacy of HBsAg Vaccine in combination with Entecavir in patients who have been treated with HB110E HBV DNA vaccine.

clinical_study.study_design: Endpoint Classification: Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Single Group Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Treatment

primary_outcome.measure: Immunogenicity: HBV specific T-cell response by ELISPOT
primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline in HBV specificic T-cell response at 16 weeks
primary_outcome.description: sample for immunologic assay will be collected at each visit; VS(~4week), VT1(0week), VT2(8week), VF(16week. T-cell response will be measured by ex-vivo & cultured ELISPOT.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from baseline in HBsAg titer at 16 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: sample for HBsAg will be collected at each visit; VS(~4week), VT1(0week), VT2(8week), VF(16week. Change from baseline in HBsAg titer will be measured at VF.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- subjects who have been treated with HB110E 2mg or 4mg within 6 months prior to screening.
- positive HBsAg at screening
- serum HBV DNA level below 300copies/mL at screening
- ALT level within 2 x ULN at screening
- voluntarily provide the informed consent
Exclusion Criteria:
- participation in other study within 30 days of screening
- subjects with severe allergic reaction or severe adverse event to HBsAg vaccine, or not suitable for HBsAg vaccine.
- any other conditions that are considered inappropriate for the study by the investigator

facility.name: The Catholic University of Korea Seoul St. Mary's Hospital
